name: Slime Witch!
description:
Slime witch is an idle / virtual pet simulation game made for Virtual Pet Jam.

As always, DOWNLOADING TO PLAY IS RECOMMENDED FOR BEST PERFORMANCE.

Use your mouse to interact with your slimes and the environment. Click on the mana orbs to collect them, you can also click on an empty area and drag over the mana orbs to collect multiple.

"ESC" to bring up the pause menu.

"TAB" to bring out the developer console.

For jam participants and streamers, if you would like to skip ahead, you can use the code "showcase" (without quotes) in the developer console.

Saving/loading is not tested on the browser, may not work.

Detailed gameplay instructions can be accessed inside the game.

Development will most likely continue after the jam.
